interfaces.name: SdsFooterRowConfig
SdsHeaderRowConfig
SdsRowConfig

classes.name: SdsTableColumnSettings

properties.name: header
properties.description: Displayed column header -- defaults to primaryKey value in titlecase

properties.name: primaryKey
properties.description: primary key to access value from data

properties.name: sticky
properties.description: Column sticks to left side of table on horizontal scroll

classes.name: SdsTableSettings

directives.name: SdsAccordionContentDirective
SdsAccordionTitleDirective
SdsTableCellDirective
SdsTableFooterCellDirective
SdsTableHeaderCellDirective

components.name: SdsAccordionComponent

methodsClass.name: toggleMulti
methodsClass.description: Toggles the multi state of the accordion.

components.name: SdsAccordionItemComponent

methodsClass.name: close
methodsClass.description: Sets the expanded state of the expansion panel to false.

methodsClass.name: open
methodsClass.description: Sets the expanded state of the expansion panel to true.

methodsClass.name: toggle
methodsClass.description: Toggles the expanded state of the expansion panel.

methodsClass.name: toggleDisabled
methodsClass.description: Toggles the disabled state of the expansion panel.

components.name: SdsTableColumnDefComponent
components.template:
<ng-template #columnHeaderCell let-element="element">
  <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="headerCellTemplate; context: {element : element}"></ng-container>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #columnCell let-element="element">
  <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="cellTemplate; context: {element : element}"></ng-container>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #columnFooterCell let-element="element">
  <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="footerCellTemplate; context: {element : element}"></ng-container>
</ng-template>

components.name: SdsTableComponent
SdsTableFooterRowComponent
SdsTableHeaderRowComponent
SdsTableRowComponent
